actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for the continuation of the statutory minimum benefits under such title in certain cases in which benefits under the supplemental security income program under title XVI of such Act are not generally available to individuals who formerly received such minimum benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide for the continuation of the minimum monthly social security benefit under such title for certain individuals in the 50 States, the District of Columbia, Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, Guam, and American Somoa.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for the continuation of the statutory minimum benefits under such title in certain cases in which benefits under the supplemental security income program under title XVI of such Act are not generally available to individuals who formerly received such minimum benefits.
